languages.text: В системе с богатым экстракциумом собралась целая пиратская флотилия. Команда авгуров сообщает — все корабли обладают схожей сигнатурой с "Неуловимым презрением"! Из вокса раздается знакомый веселый голос: Шэлби Мастак, капитан "Презрения", наигранно вздыхает — вы прямо-таки наступаете ему на пятки, не давая урвать куш. Грузовые суда должны вот-вот подняться с поверхности щедрой на ресурсы планеты, а тут сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец решил{mf||а} помешать их ограблению.

traits.locale_text: В системе с богатым экстракциумом собралась целая пиратская флотилия. Команда авгуров сообщает — все корабли обладают схожей сигнатурой с "Неуловимым презрением"! Из вокса раздается знакомый веселый голос: Шэлби Мастак, капитан "Презрения", наигранно вздыхает — вы прямо-таки наступаете ему на пятки, не давая урвать куш. Грузовые суда должны вот-вот подняться с поверхности щедрой на ресурсы планеты, а тут сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец решил{mf||а} помешать их ограблению.

languages.text: A pirate flotilla has gathered in a system with an especially prosperous extractium. The augur crew reports that all of the voidships share their signatures with the Elusive Contempt! You hear a familiar cheerful voice from the vox: Shelby the Protospeculator sighs theatrically — you're hot on his heels, coming between him and his fortune. The cargo ships are just about to take off from the bountiful planet, but the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} wishes to rudely interrupt their plans.
languages.original_text: В системе с богатым экстракциумом собралась целая пиратская флотилия. Команда авгуров сообщает — все корабли обладают схожей сигнатурой с "Неуловимым презрением"! Из вокса раздается знакомый веселый голос: Шэлби Мастак, капитан "Презрения", наигранно вздыхает — вы прямо-таки наступаете ему на пятки, не давая урвать куш. Грузовые суда должны вот-вот подняться с поверхности щедрой на ресурсы планеты, а тут сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец решил{mf||а} помешать их ограблению.

The augur crew reports that all of the voidships share their signatures with the Elusive Contempt! You hear a familiar cheerful voice from the vox: Shelby the Protospeculator sighs theatrically — you're hot on his heels, coming between him and his fortune. The cargo ships are just about to take off from the bountiful planet, but the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} wants to rudely interrupt their planned robbery.

You hear a familiar cheerful voice from the vox: Shelby the Protospeculator sighs theatrically — you're hot on his heels, coming between him and his fortune. A pirate flotilla has gathered in a system with an especially prosperous extractium. The augur crew reports that all of the voidships share their signatures with the Elusive Contempt! You hear a familiar cheerful voice from the vox: Shelby the Protospeculator sighs theatrically — you're hot on his heels, coming between him and his fortune. The cargo ships are just about to take off from the bountiful planet, but the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} wishes to rudely interrupt their plans.

languages.text: 一支海盗舰队正聚集在一片极其繁荣的开采区域。俄歇矩阵班组报告说，所有虚空舰都带有诡秘蔑视号的标记！随后，你从音阵中听到了熟悉的愉悦声音，是首席投机家谢尔比。他戏剧性地叹了口气，表示你这么紧追不舍，阻碍了他攫取财富的计划。他说，他的货船正打算离开这颗富庶的行星，可这个粗鲁的行商浪人却打算扰乱他们的计划。
languages.original_text: A pirate flotilla has gathered in a system with an especially prosperous extractium. The augur crew reports that all of the voidships share their signatures with the Elusive Contempt! You hear a familiar cheerful voice from the vox: Shelby the Protospeculator sighs theatrically — you're hot on his heels, coming between him and his fortune. The cargo ships are just about to take off from the bountiful planet, but the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} wishes to rudely interrupt their plans.

traits.locale_text: 一支海盗舰队正聚集在一片极其繁荣的开采区域。扫描甲板报告说，所有虚空舰都带有诡秘蔑视号的标记！随后，你从音阵中听到了熟悉的愉悦声音，是首席投机家谢尔比。他戏剧性地叹了口气，表示你这么紧追不舍，阻碍了他攫取财富的计划。他说，他的货船正打算离开这颗富庶的行星，可这个粗鲁的行商浪人却打算扰乱他们的计划。

languages.text: 海賊船団は、特に収益性の高いエキストラチウムのある星系に集結した。占術クルーの報告によると、ヴォイドシップはすべてエルーシブ・コントンプト号と同じ信号を持っているそうだ！ヴォクスから聞き覚えのある明るい声が聞こえる。プロトスペクターのシェルビーが芝居がかったため息をつく。あなたは彼を追い、彼と彼の仲間の間に入り込んでしまった。貨物船は豊かな惑星から飛び立とうとするが、自由開拓者は、その計画を邪魔しようとする。
languages.original_text: A pirate flotilla has gathered in a system with an especially prosperous extractium. The augur crew reports that all of the voidships share their signatures with the Elusive Contempt! You hear a familiar cheerful voice from the vox: Shelby the Protospeculator sighs theatrically — you're hot on his heels, coming between him and his fortune. The cargo ships are just about to take off from the bountiful planet, but the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} wishes to rudely interrupt their plans.

traits.locale_text: 海賊船団は、特に収益性の高いエキストラチウムのある星系に集結した。占術クルーの報告によると、ヴォイドシップはすべてエルーシブ・コントンプト号と同じ信号を持っているそうだ！ヴォクスから聞き覚えのある明るい声が聞こえる。プロトスペクターのシェルビーが芝居がかったため息をつく。あなたは彼を追い、彼と彼の仲間の間に入り込んでしまった。貨物船は豊かな惑星から飛び立とうとするが、自由開拓者は、その計画を邪魔しようとする。

languages.text: Una flotilla pirata se ha reunido en un sistema con un extractium especialmente próspero. La tripulación de augures informa de que todas las naves del vacío tienen las mismas marcas que el Odio Escurridizo. Se oye una voz alegre y familiar por el voco: Shelby el Protoespeculador suspira dramáticamente. Le estás pisando los talones, interponiéndote entre él y su fortuna. Las naves de carga están a punto de despegar del opulento planeta, pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tenía que entrometerse.
languages.original_text: A pirate flotilla has gathered in a system with an especially prosperous extractium. The augur crew reports that all of the voidships share their signatures with the Elusive Contempt! You hear a familiar cheerful voice from the vox: Shelby the Protospeculator sighs theatrically — you're hot on his heels, coming between him and his fortune. The cargo ships are just about to take off from the bountiful planet, but the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} wishes to rudely interrupt their plans.

traits.locale_text: Una flotilla pirata se ha reunido en un sistema con un extractium especialmente próspero. La tripulación de augures informa de que todas las naves del vacío tienen las mismas marcas que el Odio Escurridizo. Se oye una voz alegre y familiar por el voco: Shelby el Protoespeculador suspira dramáticamente. Le estás pisando los talones, interponiéndote entre él y su fortuna. Las naves de carga están a punto de despegar del opulento planeta, pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tenía que entrometerse.

languages.text: Eine Piratenflottille hat sich in einem System mit einem besonders reichen Extractium versammelt. Die Augurencrew berichtet, dass alle Raumschiffe ihre Signaturen mit der Flüchtigen Verachtung teilen! Du hörst eine gut gelaunte Stimme aus dem Vox, die dir bestens vertraut ist: Shelby der Protospekulator seufzt theatralisch — du bist ihm dicht auf den Fersen, stehst zwischen ihm und seinem Vermögen. Die Frachtschiffe wollen gerade von dem ressourcenreichen Planeten abheben, doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hat selbst vor, ihre Pläne rüde zu durchkreuzen.
languages.original_text: A pirate flotilla has gathered in a system with an especially prosperous extractium. The augur crew reports that all of the voidships share their signatures with the Elusive Contempt! You hear a familiar cheerful voice from the vox: Shelby the Protospeculator sighs theatrically — you're hot on his heels, coming between him and his fortune. The cargo ships are just about to take off from the bountiful planet, but the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} wishes to rudely interrupt their plans.

traits.locale_text: Eine Piratenflottille hat sich in einem System mit einem besonders reichen Extractium versammelt. Die Augurencrew berichtet, dass alle Raumschiffe ihre Signaturen mit der Flüchtigen Verachtung teilen! Du hörst eine gut gelaunte Stimme aus dem Vox, die dir bestens vertraut ist: Shelby der Protospekulator seufzt theatralisch — du bist ihm dicht auf den Fersen, stehst zwischen ihm und seinem Vermögen. Die Frachtschiffe wollen gerade von dem ressourcenreichen Planeten abheben, doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hat selbst vor, ihre Pläne rüde zu durchkreuzen.

languages.text: Une flottille pirate s'est rassemblée dans un système à l'extractium particulièrement prospère. Les augures vous informent que l'ensemble des vaisseaux partagent leur signature avec l'Insaisissable Avanie ! Soudain, une voix enjouée et familière s'élève du canal-vox. Shelby le Protospéculateur pousse un soupir théâtral ; vous le talonnez de près et vous vous interposez entre lui et sa fortune. Ses transporteurs chargés à bloc sont sur le point de quitter cette planète ô combien lucrative, mais {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a le toupet d'interrompre brutalement leurs opérations.
languages.original_text: A pirate flotilla has gathered in a system with an especially prosperous extractium. The augur crew reports that all of the voidships share their signatures with the Elusive Contempt! You hear a familiar cheerful voice from the vox: Shelby the Protospeculator sighs theatrically — you're hot on his heels, coming between him and his fortune. The cargo ships are just about to take off from the bountiful planet, but the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} wishes to rudely interrupt their plans.

traits.locale_text: Une flottille pirate s'est rassemblée dans un système à l'extractium particulièrement prospère. Les augures vous informent que l'ensemble des vaisseaux partagent leur signature avec l'Insaisissable Avanie ! Soudain, une voix enjouée et familière s'élève du canal-vox. Shelby le Protospéculateur pousse un soupir théâtral ; vous le talonnez de près et vous vous interposez entre lui et sa fortune. Ses transporteurs chargés à bloc sont sur le point de quitter cette planète ô combien lucrative, mais {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a le toupet d'interrompre brutalement leurs opérations.

languages.text: Özellikle zengin bir ayıklayıcıya sahip bir sistemde bir korsan filosu toplanmış. Alamet mürettebatı, tüm uçsuz gemilerinin Kaçkın Kibir ile aynı imzayı paylaştığını rapor ediyor! Voksyayardan tanıdık, neşeli bir ses duyuyorsun: Protospekülatör Shelby teatral bir şekilde iç çekiyor. Onun peşindesin, onunla serveti arasına giriyorsun. Kargo gemileri, bereketli gezegenden kalkmak üzere. Hür Tacir ise planlarını tatsızca bozmak istiyor.
languages.original_text: A pirate flotilla has gathered in a system with an especially prosperous extractium. The augur crew reports that all of the voidships share their signatures with the Elusive Contempt! You hear a familiar cheerful voice from the vox: Shelby the Protospeculator sighs theatrically — you're hot on his heels, coming between him and his fortune. The cargo ships are just about to take off from the bountiful planet, but the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} wishes to rudely interrupt their plans.
